title: What are the health benefits and remedies associated with gemstones and astrology signs?
first_phrase: This text provides information about the properties of different precious stones and the recommended diet for people belonging to specific zodiac signs. The last section is specifically about the Scorpio zodiac sign, discussing the appropriate foods for this sign and suggesting remedies for their corresponding anatomical areas such as the sexual organs and the anus, which are influenced by Pluto and Mars. Also, it advises the Scorpio individuals to avoid smoked meat, canned food, sweets, fats, and wine, but to include many vegetables, fresh fruit, lean meat, and mineral water in their diet. The section also recommends certain gemstones and herbs that help Scorpios.
content: SCORPIONE (23.10-21.11 da 1200 a 240°) Segno: acqua fisso femminile. Pianeti: Plutone, Marte. Corrispondenza anatomica: organi sessuali, ano (emorroidi). Pietre consigliate: topazio, granato, corallo. Metallo: oro, argento. Gli appartenenti al segno dello Scorpione devono eliminare lo scatolame, le carni ed i pesci affumicati, i grassi, il burro, i dolci e l’abbondanza di vino. Sono consigliate poche spezie e cibi piccanti, molta verdura e frutta fresca, frutta cotta, carni magre grigliate. L’olio di semi è consigliato come condimento. Molta acqua minerale. Lo Scorpione necessita di solfato di calcio, cicatrizzante, depurativo e disinfettante. Alimenti energetici per il segno dello Scorpione. Pane, pasta e riso integrali, miele, olio di semi, confetture. Alimenti proteici per il segno dello Scorpione. Yogurt, uova, soia, cacciagione, carni magre grigliate, formaggi magri, latte cagliato. Alimenti del segno (Scorpione). Verdure: cipolle, crescione, cavoli, carote, asparagi, bietole, dente di leone, lattuga, patate, piselli freschi, pomodori, sedano, porri, topinambur. Frutta: uva, pesche, fragole, lamponi, pompelmi, noci, nocciole, noci di cocco, meloni, mele, mandorle, ananas. Aromi consigliati per il segno dello Scorpione. Aglio, salvia, ruta, basilico. Solfato di calcio (Scorpione). Aglio, cipolla, porri, cavolfiori, crescione, rape, ravanelli, fichi, prugne secche. Rimedi contro le emorroidi. Emorroidi.
last_phrase: To conclude, taking care of our health and following a proper diet according to our zodiac sign can have significant benefits on our physical and mental well-being. For those born under the sign of Scorpio, it is recommended to avoid certain foods such as fats and smoked meats, and to focus on a diet rich in vegetables, lean meats, and fruit. Additionally, using remedies such as oil of rosemary and introducing certain foods like carciofi can help improve liver health, which is essential for the Scorpio sign.
